name: PixelFem #41 - Cleopatra VII Philopator
description:
The name Cleopatra, for most people, conjures images of golden splendor, a romantic suicide by snake, a seductress on an embellished lounge being fanned by palm leaves. Often Cleopatra was framed as just a pretty woman swept up in the world of international politics by her powerful lovers. But this isn’t the full story, because the history of Cleopatra is largely written by men. Many sources, both modern and ancient, claim that her beauty wasn’t the most striking thing about her; rather, her extraordinary wit and intelligence is what made men fall to their knees.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
